entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 4:23 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snow or ice pellets before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
